game.name: Blaze Of Empires
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, 캡션 이용 가능, 레벨 에디터 포함, 코멘터리 제공
game.shortDescription: In this base-building RTS you’ll find collectible roguelike cards, weekly challenges and online co-op that turn every PvE war (and optional PvP) into an epically different story.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this base-building RTS you’ll find collectible roguelike cards, weekly challenges and online co-op that turn every PvE war (and optional PvP) into an epically different story.
